public class Word
extends Object
implements Cloneable
This class represents a word

Version:
0.1
Author:
Beno Kurmann, Michel Marti

Word(int)
Creates a new Word object
Word(int, int)
Creates a new Word object with a given value

copy()
Returns a copy of itself
getBit(int)
Returns value of specified bit
getWidth()
Returns the width (in Bits) of the word
setBit(int, boolean)
sets a specific bit
setInteger(int)
Sets the word to the specified value
toInteger()
Returns the integer representation of the Word
toString()
Converts the value of the Word into a "readable" format

balue - Value to set
